title: 7/29/21: Biden's Infrastructure Bill, Workers Against Vaccine Mandates, Kushner's New Grift, Trump's Failed Endorsement, Bernie Speaks, CDC Disaster, Simone Biles Derangement, Miners Striking, and More!

itunes:title: 7/29/21: Biden's Infrastructure Bill, Workers Against Vaccine Mandates, Kushner's New Grift, Trump's Failed Endorsement, Bernie Speaks, CDC Disaster, Simone Biles Derangement, Miners Striking, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar cover the details of the Biden infrastructure package, workers fighting vaccine mandates, Jared Kushner's newest grift, Trump's failed GOP primary endorsement, Bernie Sanders' thoughts on the Biden administration, CDC embarrassing itself, deranged responses to Simone Biles, coal miners striking, and more!
